plot: Documentary short on Paul Carter - surfer, shaper, artist. An introspective look at this remarkable figure in the world of surfing and his philosophy of surfing as a metaphor for life.
title: Search for the Key
plot_es: Documentary short on Paul Carter - surfer, shaper, artist. An introspective look at this remarkable figure in the world of surfing and his philosophy of surfing as a metaphor for life.
plot_en: Documentary short on Paul Carter - surfer, shaper, artist. An introspective look at this remarkable figure in the world of surfing and his philosophy of surfing as a metaphor for life.
